name: Cooking With Polygons
description:
Cooking With Polygons is a first person simulation game. You will need to prepare and cook various burgers or baps that are ordered and send them to the correct table.

When an order comes through, you will need to grab the correct food items from the fridge and get them sizzling on the griddle. Be careful not to leave them on for too long though!

When you think the food is ready, stack em up to create the order, then pop the plate on the correct table. Look out for the waiter, who isn't very chatty, but is extremely efficient. 

Money received back from customers depends on how well you cooked and presented their meal. The order screen will display all the information you need.

The game features a live customer feedback system as well as a shop where you can purchase meals to add to your menu. 

Time management is key in this game with there being a fixed time limit per shift. The more quality meals you send, the more money you will make!

Make use of the tutorial to help you get set up with the mechanics.
